synopsis.text:
Robot ics and heroism run deep in the Kaneda family, as Masato Kaneda steps up to the plate in the year 2030 to continue his father Shotaro's legacy of defending the world with the mighty Tetsujin 28 FX. This new-and-improved robot, an upgrade from the original Tetsujin 28, is primed to take on nefarious organizations like the Pink Mafia and the Franken group, as well as the sinister Neo Black Gang.

After a mysterious disappearance, Masato returns to the fold, reuniting with his family and friends to safeguard Earth from these malevolent forces. With his brilliant mother Yoko providing cutting-edge upgrades for Tetsujin 28 FX, and his father Shotaro occasionally joining the fray, Masato and his powerful robot companion stand as a beacon of hope against the onslaught of villains and rogue robots threatening the world. Can this new generation of Kaneda warriors rise to the challenge and secure the future for all? Join Masato and Tetsujin 28 FX in their thrilling and action-packed adventures!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
